CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Safe & Green Holdings Corp. is a provider of modular facilities (modules). The Company provides modules made out of both code-engineered cargo shipping containers and wood for use as both permanent and temporary structures for residential housing use and commercial use, including for health care facilities. The Company operates through four segments: construction, medical, real estate development, and environmental. The construction segment designs and constructs modular structures built in its factories using raw materials that are made in the United States. In the medical segment, it uses its modular technology to offer turnkey solutions for medical testing and treatment. Its real estate development segment builds green single or multifamily projects in underserved regions nationally using its modules. The environmental segment offers sustainable medical and waste management solutions that have patented technology to collect waste and treat waste for safe disposal.
